Portland, Oregon mayor wants federal agents out of restive US city tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747574 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/747574/portland-oregon-mayor-wants-federal-agents-out-of-restive-us-city/story/ The mayor of Portland, Oregon demanded the withdrawal of federal officers from the northwestern US city, accusing them of dangerously escalating the situation with abusive, unconstitutional tactics against protesters. Mon, 20 Jul 2020 00:51:36 +0800
Cubans celebrate no local transmission of COVID-19 for first time in four months tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747573 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/747573/cubans-celebrate-no-local-transmission-of-covid-19-for-first-time-in-four-months/story/ Cuba for the first time in 130 days on Sunday said there were no new domestic cases of COVID-19 as most of the country moved into the final phase of resuming normal activities with masks and social distancing. Mon, 20 Jul 2020 00:40:08 +0800
295 more health workers get COVID-19; total up to 3,938 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747572 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/747572/295-more-health-workers-get-covid-19-total-up-to-3-938/story/ The Department of Health (DOH) on Sunday reported that 295 more health workers contracted the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) over the past week, raising the total to 3,938 as of July 18. UK says China committing gross abuses against Uighurs tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747564 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/747564/uk-says-china-committing-gross-abuses-against-uighurs/story/ Rights groups and experts estimate that more than one million ethnic Uighurs and other Turkic-speaking minorities have been rounded up into a network of internment camps in China. 4 Pasig streets placed under 14-day localized ECQ starting July 19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747563 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/747563/4-pasig-streets-placed-under-14-day-localized-ecq-starting-july-19/story/ Four streets in Napico, Barangay Manggahan in Pasig City will be placed under a 14-day localized enhanced community quarantine starting July 19, Sunday due to the spike in COVID-19 cases in those areas. Twitter removes video retweeted by Trump after Linkin Park complains tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747557 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/747557/twitter-removes-video-retweeted-by-trump-after-linkin-park-complains/story/ "Linkin Park did not and does not endorse Trump, nor authorize his organization to use any of our music. A cease and desist has been issued," the rock group said on Twitter. Sun, 19 Jul 2020 19:58:30 +0800
After claiming win over virus Roque admits one life lost is one too many tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747556 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/747556/after-claiming-win-over-virus-roque-admits-one-life-lost-is-one-too-many/story/ Following an earlier declaration that the country was winning against the illness due to fewer deaths, Presidential Spokesman Harry Roque on Sunday said “one life lost is one too many” in the country s fight against the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
